definition: loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)
to unstring a bow/to slacken/to relax/to loosen
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Dynamic relaxation method as a new numerical method has been developed since 1960.
sentences.chinese: 動力鬆弛法是近十多年來提出並發展的一種數值方法。

sentences.english: The relaxation method in analog computation for rectification process of associate systems is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹締合物系精餾過程模擬計算的鬆弛法。

sentences.english: Progressive muscle relaxation helps the body to systematically release tension, this means start at one point of your body and make it relax.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉間斷鬆弛法就能使你的身體有條不紊地進行放鬆。

sentences.english: SLOR and pseudo-time iterative method are employed for solving finite element equation.
sentences.chinese: 採用線鬆弛法和人工時間相關法求解有限元方程。

sentences.english: The label relaxation method for edge detection is described in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 描述了邊緣檢測的標記鬆弛法。

sentences.english: The dynamic relaxation method is applied to the static analysis of cable nets.
sentences.chinese: 應用動態鬆弛法，計算索網結構的位移和拉力。

sentences.english: The results of the simulation with the relaxation method and the…
sentences.chinese: 分析了鬆弛法和單純形法尋優的結果。

sentences.english: This system is based on the Lagrangian relaxation approach.
sentences.chinese: 該系統是以拉格朗日鬆弛法框架爲核心。
